metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（阿柔超级站气象要素梯度观测系统-2015）
metadata.description:
This data set contains the data of meteorological element gradient observation system of alou superstation, upstream of heihe hydrometeorological observation network, from January 1, 2015 to December 31, 2015.The station is located in caoban village, aru township, qilian county, qinghai province.The longitude and latitude of the observation point are 100.4643e, 38.0473n and 3033m above sea level.The air temperature, relative humidity and wind speed sensors are located at 1m, 2m, 5m, 10m, 15m and 25m respectively, with a total of six layers facing due north.The wind direction sensor is located at 10m, facing due north;The barometer is installed at 2m;The tilting bucket rain gauge is installed on the observation tower 40m of super aru station;The four-component radiometer is installed at 5m, facing due south;Two infrared thermometers are installed at 5m, facing due south, and the probe facing vertically downward.The photosynthetic effective radiometer is installed at 5m, facing due south, and the probe facing vertically upward.Part of the soil sensor is buried at 2m in the south direction of the tower body, and the soil heat flow plate (self-correcting formal) (3 pieces) are all buried at 6cm underground.The mean soil temperature sensor TCAV is buried 2cm and 4cm underground.The soil temperature probe is buried at the surface of 0cm and underground of 2cm, 4cm, 6cm, 10cm, 15cm, 20cm, 30cm, 40cm, 60cm, 80cm, 120cm, 160cm, 200cm, 240cm, 280cm and 320cm, among which the 4cm and 10cm layers have three repeats.The soil water sensor is buried underground 2cm, 4cm, 6cm, 10cm, 15cm, 20cm, 30cm, 40cm, 60cm, 80cm, 120cm, 160cm, 200cm, 240cm, 280cm and 320cm respectively, among which the 4cm and 10cm layers have three duplexes.
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_1 m, Ta_2 m, Ta_5 m, Ta_10 m, Ta_15 m and Ta_25 m; RH_1 m, RH_2 m, RH_5 m, RH_10 m, RH_15 m and RH_25 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_1 m, Ws_2 m, Ws_5 m, Ws_10 m, Ws_15 m and Ws_25 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_2 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), photosynthetically active radiation (PAR) (μmol/(s m-2)), average soil temperature (TCAV, ℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2 and Gs_3) (W/m2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm_1, Ts_4 cm_2, Ts_4 cm_3, Ts_6 cm, Ts_10 cm_1, Ts_10 cm_2, Ts_10 cm_3, Ts_15 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_30 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_60 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, Ts_160 cm, Ts_200 cm, Ts_240 cm, Ts_280 cm and Ts_320 cm) (℃), and soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm_1, Ms_4 cm_2, Ms_4 cm_3, Ms_6 cm, Ms_10 cm_1, Ms_10 cm_2, Ms_10 cm_3, Ms_15 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_30 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_60 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, Ms_160 cm, Ms_200 cm, Ms_240 cm, Ms_280 cm and Ms_320 cm) (%, volumetric water content).
Processing and quality control of observed data :(1) ensure 144 pieces of data every day (every 10min), and mark by -6999 in case of data missing;Soil temperature and humidity, soil heat flux between September 9, 2015 to September 19, 2015 and September 30, 2015 to October 20, 2015 due to power supply problems, data missing;(2) excluding the time with duplicate records;(3) data that obviously exceeds the physical significance or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the part marked with red letter in the data is the data in question;(5) date and time have the same format, and date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: June 10, 2015, 10:30;(6) the naming rule is: AWS+ site name.
For information of hydrometeorological network or station, please refer to Liu et al. (2018), and for observation data processing, please refer to Liu et al. (2011).
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2015年1月1日至2015年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网上游阿柔超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于青海省祁连县阿柔乡草达坂村，下垫面是高寒草地。观测点的经纬度是100.4643E,38.0473N，海拔3033m。空气温度、相对湿度、风速传感器分别架设在1m、2m、5m、10m、15m、25m处，共6层，朝向正北；风向传感器架设在10m处，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在阿柔超级站40m观测塔上；四分量辐射仪安装在5m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在5m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；光合有效辐射仪安装在5m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向上；土壤部分传感器埋设在塔体正南方向2m处，其中土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）均埋设在地下6cm处；平均土壤温度传感器TCAV埋设在地下2cm、4cm处；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、6cm、10cm、15cm、20cm、30cm、40cm、60cm、80cm、120cm、160cm、200cm、240cm、280cm、320cm处，其中4cm和10cm这两层有三个重复；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、6cm、10cm、15cm、20cm、30cm、40cm、60cm、80cm、120cm、160cm、200cm、240cm、280cm、320cm处，其中4cm和10cm这两层有三个重复。
观测项目有：风速（WS_1m、WS_2m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_25m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_1m、Ta_2m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_25m和RH_1m、RH_2m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_25m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、光合有效辐射（PAR）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm_1、Ms_4cm_2、Ms_4cm_3、Ms_6cm、Ms_10cm_1、Ms_10cm_2、Ms_10cm_3、Ms_15cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_30cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm Ms_200cm、Ms_240cm、Ms_280cm、Ms_320cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm_1、Ts_4cm_2、Ts_4cm_3、Ts_6cm、Ts_10cm_1、Ts_10cm_2、Ts_10cm_3、Ts_15cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_30cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm Ts_200cm、Ts_240cm、Ts_280cm、Ts_320cm）(单位：摄氏度)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；土壤温湿度、土壤热通量在2015.9.9-9.19和9.30-10.20之间由于供电问题，数据缺失；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2015-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'meteorological gradient observation system' mean in the context of data collection in hydrometeorological networks?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在水文气象网络的数据收集中，“气象梯度观测系统”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: A meteorological gradient observation system refers to a structured setup where various meteorological parameters such as air temperature, relative humidity, and wind speed are measured at multiple vertical levels or layers. This system allows for detailed analysis of atmospheric conditions at different heights and helps in understanding the vertical profile of these parameters. In a hydrometeorological network, it is used to collect comprehensive data on atmospheric conditions over a specific region, aiding in ecological and hydrological research.
Definition.AnswerCn: 气象梯度观测系统是一个结构化的设置，用于在多个垂直层次上测量各种气象参数，如空气温度、相对湿度和风速。该系统允许对不同高度的气象条件进行详细分析，有助于理解这些参数的垂直分布。在水文气象网络中，它用于收集特定区域的全面气象数据，帮助进行生态和水文研究。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What underlying factors might cause data gaps or errors during the collection of hydrometeorological data in high-altitude grassland areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在高海拔草原地区收集水文气象数据时，可能导致数据缺口或错误的潜在因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data gaps or errors in the collection of hydrometeorological data in high-altitude grassland areas can be caused by issues such as power supply failures, which affected data collection for soil moisture and temperature between certain dates. Additionally, data that is clearly outside the physical or instrumental range is removed, and duplicate records are discarded. Variability in environmental conditions or sensor orientations might also contribute to data discrepancies or uncertainties.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 高海拔草原地区水文气象数据收集中的数据缺口或错误可能由多种问题引起，例如电源故障，这影响了某些日期的土壤湿度和温度数据收集。此外，明显超出物理或仪器范围的数据会被删除，重复记录也会被丢弃。环境条件或传感器方向的变化也可能导致数据差异或不确定性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in setting up a meteorological observation system to monitor environmental variables in high-altitude regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在高海拔地区设置气象观测系统以监测环境变量涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The setup involves installing a meteorological observation system with sensors placed at various heights (1m, 2m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 25m) for air temperature and relative humidity, and a wind direction sensor at 10m. Pressure sensors are installed at 2m, and a tipping bucket rain gauge is placed on a 40m observation tower. Radiation instruments are installed at 5m, with infrared thermometers and a photosynthetically active radiation sensor also positioned there. Soil sensors, including soil heat flux plates, soil temperature, and moisture probes, are buried at different depths ranging from 0cm to 320cm. Data collection is performed every 10 minutes, and data quality control measures involve marking missing data, removing duplicates, and eliminating data outside the physical or instrumental range.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该设置涉及安装一个气象观测系统，传感器分别安装在不同高度（1米、2米、5米、10米、15米、25米）用于空气温度和相对湿度，风向传感器安装在10米处。压力传感器安装在2米处，倾倒桶雨量计放置在40米的观测塔上。辐射仪器安装在5米处，红外测温仪和光合有效辐射传感器也位于该高度。土壤传感器，包括土壤热通量板、土壤温度和湿度探头，埋设在不同深度，范围从0厘米到320厘米。数据每10分钟收集一次，数据质量控制措施包括标记缺失数据、删除重复数据和消除超出物理或仪器范围的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions and technologies enable the collection of detailed meteorological and soil data in high-altitude grassland environments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件和技术能够在高海拔草原环境中收集详细的气象和土壤数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of detailed meteorological and soil data in high-altitude grassland environments is enabled by the strategic placement of multiple sensors at varying heights and depths, such as air temperature, relative humidity, wind speed, and soil sensors. Technologies involved include multi-layered sensor systems for air and soil conditions, four-component radiometers, infrared thermometers, and soil moisture sensors. The site conditions, such as its altitude and geographical location, play a crucial role in data collection. Additionally, the data collection process involves rigorous quality control measures to ensure data accuracy, including marking missing data and removing outliers.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在高海拔草原环境中，通过在不同高度和深度战略性地布置多个传感器，能够收集详细的气象和土壤数据，这些传感器包括空气温度、相对湿度、风速和土壤传感器。所涉及的技术包括用于空气和土壤条件的多层传感器系统、四分量辐射计、红外温度计和土壤湿度传感器。现场条件，如海拔和地理位置，在数据收集过程中起着至关重要的作用。此外，数据收集过程还涉及严格的质量控制措施，以确保数据的准确性，包括标记缺失数据和去除异常值。
